column6: This luxurious room is supplied with a king bed with tempur-pedic mattress. You will burrow yourself under the smooth satin-like linens. The connecting sitting room is furnished with a flat-screened HD-TV for your enjoyment. Complimentary Wi-fi is available as well. \nThick, lush Turkish towels, spa robes, toiletries, hair dryer, and magnifying make-up mirror are provided in the large in-room bathroom. \nThis room sleeps two adults.
